Summary: The caption of the Sign In button in is misaligned vertically
Creator: Kanchana Karunarathna
Description:
Action Performed

# Open [https://academybugs.com|https://academybugs.com/]
# Click the Find Bugs link on the navigation bar
# Open a product
# Scroll to the bottom and find the sign in form in the right side menu
# Enter any login and password that are not registered and click "Sign In"

Expected Result

The caption of the Sign In button is centered vertically

Actual Result

The caption of the Sign In button is misaligned vertically

Summary: There are unreadable symbols in the shopping cart popup.
Creator: Kanchana Karunarathna
Description:
Action Performed

# Open [https://academybugs.com|https://academybugs.com/]
# Click the Find Bugs link on the navigation bar
# Add one or more products to the cart
# Click "View Cart" on top of the page
# Scroll down to the Shopping Cart section of the right side menu
# Hover over the Shopping Cart caption

Expected Result

All characters are clear to a regular user

Actual Result

There are unreadable symbols in the shopping cart popup

Summary: The page becomes unresponsive when clicking on the numbers of results.
Creator: Kanchana Karunarathna
Description:
h3. *Action Performed*

# Open [*https://academybugs.com*|https://academybugs.com/]
# Click the Find Bugs link on the navigation bar
# Click on the buttons to show a certain number of results at the top left

h3. *Expected Result*

The selected number of results is displayed according to the clicked buttons

h3. *Actual Result*

The page freezes when clicking on the numbers of results
